mapper.select: SELECT a.`ID` AS id, d.`PROJECT_CODE` AS Project_ID,c.`ID_CODE` AS id_code,c.`EMP_NAME` AS emp_name,a.`CONTRACT_NO` AS contract_no,a.`CONTRACT_DATE` AS contract_date, a.`CONTRACT_EXPIRE_DATE` AS contract_expire,a.`CONTRACT_FILE` AS contract_file FROM ${lppcrTableName} a, ${lppTableName} b, ${lpTableName} c, ${pTableName} d WHERE a.`PROJECT_PERSON_ID`=b.`ID` AND b.`PERSON_ID`=c.`ID` AND b.`PROJECT_ID`=d.`ID` AND a.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND b.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND c.`IS_SEALED`=0 AND a.`IS_SYNCHRO`=0 AND d.`PROJECT_ID`=#{PROJECT_ID}
